name: Nano War 2
description:
(First release: 2011 -> 4 MILLION PLAYERS)

Every human own billons of nanoscopic cells.

Some of these cells are doomed to protect our organism and fight foreign organisms.
Even confined to smaller and unlikely places the war is present.
Welcome on Nano War 2…

The goal of Nano War 2 is quite simple: annihilate your opponents. You are the blue cells and you have to capture the others cells to win. You can increase, capture and develop new cells to beat your enemies.
With the new gameplay and the new cells (rock, paper, scissors system) you have to find the best strategy on every situations.
